channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stock futures and crypto prices sink after a painful week on Wall Street
item.description: U.S. stock-market futures fell late Sunday, after a volatile week on Wall Street that saw the Nasdaq fall into correction territory.

item.title: How sustainable diaper brand Kudos is taking on industry giants ‚Äî with a Target rollout
item.description: Kudos has sought to make a better, more sustainable diaper that uses cotton instead of plastic in its bid to disrupt the consumer products industry.

item.title: Japan stocks plunge over 8%, hovering near bear market territory, as Asia shares extend sell-off
item.description: Investors will look toward key trade data from China and Taiwan this week, as well as central bank decisions from Australia and India.

item.title: How Did I Trade Today‚Äôs Bloodbath

item.title: China‚Äôs Caixin PMI signals pickup in services-sector activity
item.description: A private gauge of China‚Äôs services sector signaled that activity expanded at a faster pace in July compared with a month ago, in contrast with the trend seen in official data.

item.title: Why pharmacy chains like Walgreens and CVS are shuttering locations
item.description: Walgreens is citing macro issues, like a worsening consumer environment and pressure on pharmacy margins, while grappling with its own set of issues.

item.title: High temperatures scorch China, spiking power demand
item.description: The national weather forecaster on Monday cautioned of potential fire hazards caused by excessive power consumption and excessive electrical loads.

item.title: How to try and grow $2,000
item.description: *sponsored by Hi guys and gals. For the better part of 18-months I‚Äôve been working on a service I call the $2,000 Small Account Journey. This is an options trading blueprint for small accounts. While some of my $2,000 balances haven‚Äôt gone up a lot, or even down, I‚Äôve been able run one to [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Stock-market investors went from cheering a ‚ÄòGoldilocks‚Äô economy to fearing recession. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs next.
item.description: Stock-market investors have spent most of 2024 celebrating a ‚ÄùGoldilocks‚Äù economy running neither too hot nor too cold. A run of weak U.S. economic data to begin August is now stoking fears that the bears have come home.

item.title: Ex-Trump White House officials, dozens of Republicans endorse Harris
item.description: Kamala Harris has surged in polls since President Joe Biden dropped out and endorsed her in July.

item.title: UBS says 'going into Japan now is like catching a falling knife,' warns stock sell-off will continue
item.description: The Nikkei 225 and the Topix extended their declines, falling past 7% on the day, and hovering close to bear market territory.

item.title: Chinese co makes remote robot surgery breakthrough
item.description: Good day, 360! Here are our top investing ideas today. And don‚Äôt forget to join us in Market Masters ‚Äì the hottest trading room around üî•. item.title: Corporate profit growth is on pace for its best quarter since just before 2022‚Äôs inflation spell
item.description: After last week‚Äôs quarterly-results megastorm, second-quarter earnings season is roughly three-quarters of the way through.

item.title: Retiring Corvette 'godfather' on EVs, spinoff and a performance SUV
item.description: The "godfather" of GM's modern day Corvettes Tadge Juechter retired Wednesday after roughly 47 years with the automaker, including 31 years devoted to Corvette.

item.title: No passports needed: Singapore launches biometric immigration processing at Changi Airport
item.description: Singapore launches trials for travelers to clear immigration at Changi Airport using biometric data in lieu of passport checks.

item.title: Market Turnaround: What‚Äôs Hot Right Now üî•
item.description: Good evening, Folks. Jeff Bishop here! I don‚Äôt know about you, but Friday sure felt like a great way for me to end the week. It was a very choppy week, and a few trades didn‚Äôt go my way, but when I saw the market start to turn the corner on Friday, I knew it [‚Ä¶]

item.title: A viral chart suggests a recession is coming after the Fed cuts interest rates ‚Äî but don‚Äôt panic yet
item.description: A viral chart made the rounds on social media showing the correlation to recessions and peak interest rates.

item.title: A little-known law has forced more than 120,000 veterans to return payouts they received to leave the military, new data shows
item.description: A federal law forced thousands of disabled veterans over the years to return the sizeable payouts they received to leave the military.

item.title: Taiwan under pressure to bolster its defense as Trump-Harris presidential race stokes policy concerns
item.description: Experts say that Taiwan is under more pressure to build up its defense capabilities and deterrence in the face of uncertainty in the upcoming U.S. elections.
